description.1: Spices have been weirdly valuable for thousands of years.
You've always been skilled at violence. You tried to use those skills in the right way.

start.title: Staring Down the Barrel of a Modified X-42 Laser Blaster
start.text: It's true what they say about your life flashing before your eyes when you're about to die. As the finger on the trigger starts to squeeze, what do you see?

zap.title: ZAP!
zap.text:
The searing hot bolt of purple energy grazes your cheek. You're alive.
"Your kind isn't so useful with a laser-hole in your skull. Bring back a thousand credits. Or you're dead for real." 
The enforcer whips her scaled tale behind her with a flourish and is gone.

bazaar.title: Xylax Bazaar.
bazaar.text: A thousand languages reverberate through the packed halls of the bazaar, but the dialect of barter is universal.

button.title: Browse Xylx Bazaar.
button.text: If you want to make some money, trading at the bazaar is a great place to do it.

brigands.title: Under Attack!
brigands.text: Klaxons sound throughout the station! An assault ship full of raiders is launching drill-pods packed full of bandits!

button.title: Some credits on the floor.
button.text: That's lucky. Better scoop them up.

station.title: Blue Sun Station
station.text: A nexus of illegal trade, gambling, criminality, and other profitable activities. Orbits an ancient, artificial sun left behind by one of the countless species lost to the galaxy.

button.title: A life of adventure and conflict.
button.text: I was an explorer. A warrior. And to some, a hero.

conclusion.title: A Hero.
conclusion.text: Of course it would end this way. You've made a lot of enemies as you fought your way across the galaxy.

button.title: A life of industry and trade.
button.text: I was a negotiator. A merchant. I found opportunities few could.

conclusion.title: A Trader
conclusion.text: Is this the result of an exchange gone wrong? With a little more time, you're sure you could find a way out of this. There's always a way to make a deal.

button.title: Pick yourself up.
button.text: All this over a thousand credits?

conclusion.title: A debt to pay.
conclusion.text: A thousand credits is a lot to scrape together quickly. Fortunately this station is home to a lot of black market hustlers and gangsters. Plenty of people with money who need some muscle.

button.title: Loiter suspiciously.
button.text: There's no law against it, right?

conclusion.title: You're up to something...
conclusion.text: You fidget. You squirm. You lean against a beam then change your mind. Why are you sweating?

button.title: Sell some spice.
button.text: A serpentine creature with three tounges is offering 100 credits per block of spice.

conclusion.title: A successful transaction.
conclusion.text: With a hiss, the creature stows the spice in a biological pouch.

conclusion.title: Theft!
conclusion.text: You were so busy negotiating with the serpent that you didn't notice the others slithering up behind you until it was too late. They take your spice and leave.

button.title: Repel them!
button.text: Blue Sun often comes under attack from bandits and raiders. The station pays those who defend it well.

conclusion.title: Fought them off!
conclusion.text: With a prismatic spray of blaster fire, the brigands are sent packing. You personally throttled their leader and delivered her to a representative of the station masters.

conclusion.title: Routed!
conclusion.text: Whooping bandits smash several valuable doohickies then escape back to their shuttle. You find a few valuables after searching the wreckage.

conclusion.title: Easy money.
conclusion.text: You hurridly stash the credits in your pockets.

button.title: Try to lose them.
button.text: Surely they're not paid enough to follow you across the entire station?

conclusion.title: Like smoke.
conclusion.text: A right, then a left. Two rights, then eight lefts in quick succession. You stop, survey the crowd discreetly. No sign of them.

conclusion.title: No escape.
conclusion.text: After a few attempts to lose them in the chaos of the station, they corner you and shake you down.

suspicious.title: You've caught the authorities' eye!
suspicious.text: Your behavior has driven your suspicion beyond tolerable levels. A couple of uniformed goons start following you.
